description.long_description: Utility for computing the viewshed from a given observer position for a specified area of interest.

fovStart.description: FOV starting azimuth for clockwise sweep (deg).

fovEnd.description: FOV ending azimuth for clockwise sweep (deg).

dem.description: Optional DEM file to se in lieu of default elevation database.

gsd.description: Product resolution in meters-per-pixel. Defaults to the best resolution of elevation files referenced.

reticle.description: Size (in pixels) of reticle centered on observer's position. If non-zero, a border is drawn delineating the ROI.

lut.description: Specifies the optional lookup table filename for mapping the single-band output image to an RGB. The LUT provided must be in the ossimIndexToRgbLutFilter format and must handle the three output viewshed values (see --values option).

visible_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing visible terrain.

hidden_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing hidden terrain.

reticle_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) to use for the reticle and borders.

outputFile.description: The URL/filename of the WMS server where the file is now accessible

horizonFile.description: If specified, outputs the max elevation angles for all azimuths to specified URL/filename, for horizon profiling.
